data.title: spaCy - Partial Tagger
data.slogan: Sequence Tagger for Partially Annotated Dataset in spaCy
data.description: This is a library to build a CRF tagger with a partially annotated dataset in spaCy. You can build your own tagger only from dictionary.
data.author: Yasufumi Taniguchi
